entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%

Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early in the evening. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4.
